name: Laquan McDonald Episode 3 (Trial)
description:
This is part of an episodic game that portrays the different aspects of Laquan McDonald's life before and after his tragic death. The games purpose to highlight the issues with police brutality and the Chicago police department while telling a short narrative of the events leading up to his shooting and the events that led afterwards.

I would like to highlight this game was a class assignment and could be updated with new episodes giving more depth to the story of Laquan McDonald. Please feel free to give feedback on each episode! Hope you enjoy!
